title: My phone's Wi-Fi connection automatically disconnects after the screen times out. What can I do?
answer:
Change the Wi-Fi sleep policy as follows: 

 Touch Settings > WLAN > advanced menu> Keep Wi-Fi on during sleep, and select Always. 

 Note: By default, Always is selected for Keep Wi-Fi on during sleep. If the settings are modified, your phone disconnects from the Wi-Fi network when its screen turns off. The following describes the three options of Keep Wi-Fi on during sleep: 

 Always: Never disconnect a Wi-Fi connection. 

 Only when plugged in: The Wi-Fi connection never disconnects when your phone is charging. If your phone is not charging, it disconnects a Wi-Fi connection when it has been idle for 3 minutes. 

 [Never (increase data usage): The Wi-Fi connection disconnects when your phone has been idle for 16 minutes.]()
